signature: TransformedCollection<E> transformedCollection(Collection<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)

enhanced_by.method_name: transformingCollection(Collection<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve creating a transformed collection with a transformer, making them suitable for similar test setups.
The transform method is used internally by transformedCollection to transform existing elements, making it a good candidate for setting up test cases.
The add method relies on the transformedCollection to handle transformations, indicating a state dependency that should be tested together.
The addAll method also relies on the transformedCollection to handle transformations, indicating a state dependency that should be tested together.
